channel.title: Posts on Alessandro Maruccia
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Alessandro Maruccia

item.title: Keep moving forward
item.description: Intro I have been developing and designing websites for more than a few years now, to give you an idea, my very first website was built with tables on Microsoft Frontpage and Internet Explorer 5.5. Back then, trying to explain your friends and relatives what you were doing in your bedroom was pretty funny. I still remember their reactions, nodding at me with their eyes slightly closed. My dad best attempt It wasn’t rocket science anyway, I was trying my best explaining them how things works, pretty easy stuff at the time.
